title: Devs Learning
description: E-Learning services web application, made as SoyHenry's final project. Made with TypeScript, React, NodeJs, Material UI, Redux, Express, Sequelize and PosgreSQL

title: The Dogs Page
description: Informative website about dog breeds, made as an individual project by SoyHenry. Made with JavaScript, React, NodeJs, Redux, CSS3, Express, Sequelize and PosgreSQL

title: Weather App
description: Web application that provides the user with weather data about the place he/she consults. Made with JavaScript, React, NodeJs, Redux, CSS3 and the OpenWeather API

title: Translate Clone
description: Web application that tries to mimic the design and functionality of Google Translate. Made with ViteJs, using TypeScript with SWC, pure CSS, React and Google Translate API

title: FlickVerse
description: Web application for rating movies and series. Developed in TypeScript, with a backend in NestJs with TypeORM and PosgreSQL, and a frontend in ViteJs with SWC, React, Redux and CSS

title: Videojuego COIL
description: Video game made in Java with Maven, under the COIL work approach, which consists of several basic learning mini-games about concepts in the English language

title: Connect4
description: Video game made in ASP.NET with Razor Pages and C#, simulates a web version of the famous board game Connect4, with the possibility of playing against the machine or another person
